item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, April 10, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. PEP 750 – Template Strings (t-strings) have been accepted (248 points | 123 comments)

7. Gemini Live with camera and screen sharing capabilities (42 points | 8 comments)
8. Parity (YC S24) is hiring founding engineers to build an AI SRE (in-person SF) ( | hide)

27. Native frame transposition coming to Emacs 31 (166 points | 66 comments)

29. Smartfunc: Turn Docstrings into LLM-Functions (56 points | 22 comments)
30. We Designed TigerBeetle's Docs from Scratch (53 points | 26 comments)
